prompt: Create a pitch deck for: Uber but for pet rocks

slides.title: Problem Statement: The Silent Crisis of Lonely Pet Rocks
slides.content: Did you know 50% of pet rocks feel neglected? Current solutions like 'rock gardens' and 'pebble playdates' are stuck in the Stone Age. Pet rocks demand hyper-personalized, on-demand companionship to thrive in today’s gig economy. This is a $200B untapped market... and rocks don’t even need food!

slides.title: Solution: RocknRollTM – The World’s First AI-Powered Pet Rock Mobility Platform
slides.content: Swipe to summon a bespoke, IoT-enabled rock companion in under 3 minutes. Features include blockchain-based rock reputation scores, NFT collars, and ChatGPT integration for real-time geology banter. Beta testers reported a 420% increase in rock self-esteem (patent pending).

slides.title: Market Opportunity: Literally Everywhere With Gravity
slides.content: With 7.8B rocks per human and a 10,000% CAGR in sedimentary emotional needs, we’re targeting the $2.4T 'bored mineral' sector. Our pre-launch waitlist already has 3M rocks enrolled (verified via satellite imagery).

slides.title: Business Model: Disrupting Bedrock
slides.content: Freemium subscription tiers: $99/month for Pebble BasicTM (ad-supported), $999/month for Boulder PremiumTM (includes VIP meteorite concierge). 100% margins – rocks work for free. Bonus: Dynamic surge pricing during full moons when rocks are most emotionally volatile.

slides.title: Vision: From Pebbles to Post-Planetary Dominance
slides.content: Phase 1: Dominate Earth’s crust. Phase 2: Asteroid mining partnerships for premium extraterrestrial inventory. Phase 3: Geoengineering Mars into a pet rock retirement community. Exit strategy: Become Earth’s first $1T 'rockicorn' or pivot to Minecraft-Flintstones metaverse collabs.
